page.title: 07A Restaurant in Stone
page.content: Granville's Restaurant is in Granville Square near the Post Office.The plane tree in the square is the furthest north in the country.Granville's telephone number is Stone 816658.It opened on the 25th April 1985.The kitchen contains one freezer,three fridges, one microwave oven,and one gas cooker with six hot plates.The dining room has seven tables plus one in the bar area.The seating caters for up to twenty seven people. There is a selection of wines which can be served by the glass or bottle and a bar which is fully licensed.There is also a Kenco coffee maker.On certain days there is a daily special which is a three course meal costing 3 pounds 50 pence.The dining room has matching curtains and lampshades.For details of the food that is available see page 8.
